title: Yellow, Polka Dots, Green, and White: What Do the Tour de France Jerseys Mean?
content:
The Tour de France is a colorful affair, with multiple competitions going on simultaneously. The leader of each competition wears a special yellow, white, green, or polka-dot jersey.

Read the full article at Yellow, Polka Dots, Green, and White: What Do the Tour de France Jerseys Mean? on Velo.
author: Ben Delaney
